class.description: The ID of the class to transfer the value of an attribute modifier to. See [Value Modifying Power Classes](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer) for possible values.
class.markdownDescription: The ID of the class to transfer the value of an attribute modifier to. See [Value Modifying Power Classes](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer) for possible values.

attribute.description: The namespace and ID of the attribute to get the value from.
attribute.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the attribute to get the value from.

multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier for the value.
multiplier.markdownDescription: Determines the multiplier for the value.

type.description:
## Attribute Modify Transfer

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer)

Transfers the value of an attribute modifier from a specified attribute to a specified power class that extends the [`ValueModifyingPower`](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer) super-class.

Type ID: `origins:attribute_modify_transfer`



---

### üìù Note

Refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer) page for a list of __vanilla__ attributes that you can get the value from.






---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:attribute_modify_transfer",
    "class": "modify_break_speed",
    "attribute": "minecraft:generic.movement_speed",
    "multiplier": 1.25
}
```

This example will transfer the value of the attribute modifier for the `minecraft:generic.movement_speed` attribute to the `modify_break_speed` (`io.github.apace100.apoli.power.ModifyBreakSpeedPower`) class, essentially giving the player mining speed boost if the player's movement speed is quite high.
type.markdownDescription:

### üìù Note
